overview: Odd Noggins is a strange, surreal trip into a small town where nothing is quite what it seems to be. What is it about that horror movie on channel 12? Why do so many women in this small town work for the same party entertainment service? What is the significance of their bubble baths? Why so much yogurt? Who is Bob? A wild cult flick full of sci-fi horror weirdness.
title: Odd Noggins
